IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: "... To heal and strengthen the lives of children and families."
IRS990.MissionDescription: "... To heal and strengthen the lives
IRS990.Description: ADOPTION JOURNEYS/ADOPTION - THE AGENCY PROVIDES PRE-ADOPTION, ADOPTION PLACEMENT AND POST ADOPTION SERVICES TO CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES THROUGHOUT THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS. THROUGH TWO PROGRAMS TOTALING $2.4 MILLION IN REVENUE ADMINISTERED IN SIX OFFICES, THE AGENCY SERVES OVER 1,000 CLIENTS ANNUALLY. THROUGH ITS WORK WITH MARE (MASSACHUSETTS ADOPTION RESOURCE EXCHANGE,) THE AGENCY'S ADOPTION PROGRAMS AND STAFF HAVE RECEIVED SEVERAL AWARDS FOR THEIR CONTINUED COMMITTMENT TO RECRUITING FAMILIES FOR THE CHILDREN THROUGHOUT THE YEARS.

Activity2.Description: EMERGENCY SERVICES - THE AGENCY PROVIDES PSYCHIATRIC ASSESSMENT AND INTERVENTION TO PEOPLE OF ALL AGES WHO ARE IN A CRISIS SITUATION. THIS $X.X MILLION PROGRAM SERVES OVER 3,000 CLIENTS ANNUALLY. DUE TO THE RESULTS ACHIEVED DURING THE PAST SEVERAL YEARS, THE AGENCY WAS AWARDED A MULTI-YEAR CONTRACT EXTENSION AND EXPANSION OF ITS SERVICE AREA. THE AGENCY ALSO HAS BEEN PROVIDING MOBILE CRISIS INTERVENTION TO PROVIDE OUTREACH SERVICES IN HOMES, SCHOOLS AND RESIDENTIAL SETTINGS.

ActivityOther.Description: Other Program Services - Other programs provided to children and their families
